translation_mode_description: Sets mode of the gizmo to translation
rotation_mode_description: Sets mode for the gizmo to rotation
toggle_space_description: Toggle gizmo to be local to the entity instead of world
snap_to_ground_description: Snap current gizmo object to floor/surface
scale_mode_description: Sets mode for the gizmo to scale
unable_locate_entity: Unable to locate the entity! Failed to outline entity.
creator: Creator:
object_not_visible: The object is not visible and cannot be moved!
model_selection_note: Select EITHER a predefined prop from the dropdown below OR enter a custom model name - NOT BOTH!
predefined_model_description: Select a prop from the list (leave empty if using custom model below)
custom_model_description: Enter a custom model name (leave empty if using dropdown above)
model_description: Enter the model name for the object you wish to spawn.
scene_type_description: Specify the type of scene (e.g., christmas, halloween, etc.).
both_model_fields_error: Please select either a predefined prop OR enter a custom model, not both!
no_model_selected_error: Please select a model from the dropdown or enter a custom model name!
props_not_loaded: Object list not loaded yet. Please try again in a moment.
